categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: In 1 ABY, after three weeks of preparation, Imperial Governor Graeber led a raid on a secret Rebel armory in Salibury's commercial sector. 35 Rebels were captured and documents as well as 300 tons of weaponry were seized by Imperial forces assisted by Ralltiiri security forces of four countries. The raid was the largest crackdown on Ralltiir underground since the Imperial subjugation of the planet two years earlier.
